name: io.github.bgauryy/octocode-mcp
title: Octocode MCP - AI Context Platform
description: AI code research platform. Search, analyze, and extract insights from any GitHub repository.

environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: GitHub Personal Access Token. Optional - authenticate via GitHub CLI (gh auth login) for automatic token management, or set this token manually for CI/CD environments.
